title: News24.com | Lockdown has worked, says Ramaphosa as NICD head warns of ‘evolving epidemic’
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has announced a two-week extension to the nationwide lockdown while concern grows over how the coronavirus will change its pattern of transmission.
content:
While it is too early to draw definitive conclusions over the coronavirus outbreak that hit our shores, President Cyril Ramaphosa said on Thursday the evidence showed the lockdown is working to slow its spread.
Ramaphosa announced a two-week extension to the… [+5789 chars]
